items.sentence: My not knowing what to do was part of the problem.
Tom went on working even though he was very tired.
I heard Tom and Mary were planning to get married.
I think that it'd be better if you didn't do that.
I think that we should tell Tom he has to do that.
Tom went into the kitchen to get a drink of water.
This is longer than any other bridge in the world.
We have a lot of work to do before we can go home.
I've been looking forward to this for a long time.
Tom and Mary are secretly in love with each other.
